name: Finneas
text: (The door creaks open to reveal a nightmare - Penelope trembling in a hospital gown, Yosef gripping her arm as staff advance)

name: Director
text: Ah, Finneas O'Dessa.. I knew you'd find your way here, maybe you can help us?

name: Director
text: As you can see a ROGUE patient has taken your sister, we need to calm him down before he hurts her

name: Yosef
text: Sir they are LYING! They did something.. I-I don't know what it is, but it changes us

name: Director
text: Yosef is schizophrenic, he's just making himself paranoid. He is a high risk patient.

name: Yosef
text: NO! THEY'RE MAKING ZOMBIES! YOU SEE JAMIE? SMART YOUNG BOY, HE WALKS BUT THERE'S NO PERSON INSIDE!
(Penelope silently mouths 'PLEASE' while tapping her own blackening veins)

name: Head Nurse
text: Finn, be a good brother. Just help us strap down Yosef and calm him down

name: Director
text: Stop them! We can't lose Patient 0!
(The hospital staff get in front of the staircase to bllock it.)
